predicate.note: Frames file for 'toot' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: agentive
example.text: At the small four-room home of Elias Motsoaledi, a leading ANC unionist and a former commander in the group's armed wing, Umkhonto we Sizwe, well-wishers stuck little ANC flags in their hair and a man tooted on an antelope horn wrapped in ANC ribbons.
example.arg: an antelope horn wrapped in ANC ribbons
